mapper.select: SELECT id, name, epic_id, org_name, project, last_synced, created_at FROM sync_config ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sync_config (name, epic_id, org_name, project) VALUES (#{name}, #{epicId}, #{orgName}, #{project})
mapper.update: UPDATE sync_config SET last_synced = #{lastSynced} WHERE id = #{id}
